entities.name: dementor
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as having attacked again. The text does not provide further details about the attacks.

entities.name: igor karkaroff
entities.description: Igor Karkaroff's body was found in a shack up north with the Dark Mark set over it.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are mentioned as an organization that Igor Karkaroff deserted.

entities.name: sirius's brother
entities.description: Sirius's brother Regulus is mentioned as having been a Death Eater who only managed to stay alive for a few days after deserting the group.

entities.name: regulus
entities.description: Regulus is mentioned as Sirius's brother and a former member of the Death Eaters.

entities.name: dark mark
entities.description: The Dark Mark is mentioned as being set over Igor Karkaroff's body.

entities.name: north
entities.description: A shack was found in the north where Igor Karkaroff's body was discovered.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is mentioned as passing a large slice of birthday cake to someone.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as having a brother named Regulus who was a Death Eater.

relationships.description: Igor Karkaroff deserted the Death Eaters.
The Dark Mark was set over Igor Karkaroff's body.
Regulus was a member of the Death Eaters.
Sirius has a brother named Regulus.
Igor Karkaroff's body was found in a shack up north.
